name: Bolto
headline: AI platform to hire and onboard your global team
description: AI-powered recruiting and HR platform. Find and hire the best pre-vetted global software talent and simplify onboarding, payroll, and compliance.

founders.name: Jake Johnson, Founder
founders.description: Former Microsoft PM | Dartmouth Engineering '21 | Seattleite

generated_description:
Bolto is an innovative startup that leverages the power of AI to streamline the hiring and onboarding process for companies seeking global software talent. Founded in 2023 and now a proud member of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, Bolto is based in San Francisco and operates with a small but mighty team of six.

The core mission of Bolto is simple yet profound: to help businesses find, vet, hire, and manage a global workforce effortlessly. Initially launched as an AI-powered recruiting and HR platform, Bolto has quickly established itself as a go-to solution for companies looking to simplify payroll and compliance tasks while ensuring they connect with the best pre-vetted talent available.

Bolto's platform enables organizations to source top talent through AI-driven resume analysis, conduct interviews with the click of a button, and navigate contracts and onboarding processes seamlessly. Clients can run payroll, manage benefits, and handle compliance—all under one roof. This allows businesses to focus on scaling faster without getting bogged down in the complexities of hiring.

With a growing list of satisfied partners, Bolto is gaining traction among companies looking for efficiency and quality in their recruiting processes. Noteworthy endorsements from business leaders highlight the platform's effectiveness in finding skilled candidates quickly.

If you're looking to build and manage your dream team or need personalized hiring solutions, Bolto's "White Glove Service" provides tailored recruitment assistance at no extra charge. Backed by Y Combinator, Bolto is clearly making waves in the HR tech space, promising to simplify the hiring journey for businesses of all sizes. You can dive deeper into their offerings at [Bolto's website](https://www.bolto.com).
